title: LF1M Plat player to join team - Top/mid
body: Have 4 out of 5 for team, we're a pretty serious group. All very friendly and specifically 100% team work 0% flame. If you are a good, skilled top or mid player and more importantly a well cooperating team mate add and msg me ingame for invite

replies.body: ign Bambo ill happily fill :) plat v atm
i cooperate well, average skill and i dont flame so thats a plus, will improve the more i play so would be keen i added you ign Wolves
